tool_description: Analyzes soil samples for primary nutrients (NPK) and secondary/micronutrients, providing concentration levels and availability status for crop nutrition planning.

nitrogen_ppm.description: Nitrogen content in parts per million

phosphorus_ppm.description: Phosphorus content in parts per million

potassium_ppm.description: Potassium content in parts per million

calcium_ppm.description: Calcium content in parts per million

magnesium_ppm.description: Magnesium content in parts per million

sulfur_ppm.description: Sulfur content in parts per million

iron_ppm.description: Iron content in parts per million

zinc_ppm.description: Zinc content in parts per million

manganese_ppm.description: Manganese content in parts per million

copper_ppm.description: Copper content in parts per million

boron_ppm.description: Boron content in parts per million

soil_ph.description: Soil pH for nutrient availability calculation

extraction_method.description: Laboratory extraction method used (Mehlich-3, Bray-P1, Olsen)

error_messages: Invalid nutrient concentration: All nutrient values must be non-negative numbers.
Missing primary nutrients: Nitrogen, phosphorus, and potassium values are required.
Invalid pH value: Soil pH must be between 3.0 and 10.0.
Unsupported extraction method: Use Mehlich-3, Bray-P1, or Olsen.
Unrealistic nutrient levels: Check for data entry errors - values seem unusually high or low.
usage: Provide nitrogen_ppm, phosphorus_ppm, and potassium_ppm as minimum requirements. Include secondary and micronutrients plus soil_ph for comprehensive analysis.

nutrient_levels.description: Individual nutrient level classifications (low, medium, high, excessive)
